name: Block Puzzle Wooden - Jewel Fit!
description:
Block Puzzle Wooden - Jewel Fit! is amazing block puzzle game with a simple rule.
Endless time of game play.

Block Puzzle Wooden - Jewel Fit! is an addictive, easy to learn game that will have your mind bending and your fingers flying.
Fit the pieces together to clear lines in horizontal and vertical directions!
Need to consider shapes and space, not same block colors.
Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.
The more rows you eliminate at one time, the more score you will be granted.

You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!
Quickly , let's try the game.
